meanings.sent1: The race begins at the sound of the horn.
meanings.sent2: She begins her day with a cup of coffee.
meanings.sent3: The magic show begins with a puff of smoke.
meanings.sent4: The journey begins with a single step.
meanings.sent5: The music begins softly, gradually building in intensity.

meanings.definition: To have a first part or stage.
meanings.sent1: The book begins with an exciting prologue.
meanings.sent2: His speech begins with a brief introduction.
meanings.sent3: The play begins with a hilarious mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Life begins with a moment of pure joy.
meanings.sent5: The movie begins with a breathtaking aerial shot.
